pages.text: In order to color your wood blocks, you'll need to make dye baths, which when heated, become colored stains.$(br2) These Stains can be a little tricky to make, but the payoff is worth it.$(br2) One bucket goes a long way...64 blocks!
Dye Baths are made with pigments, a ball of slime, and a bucket of water.$(br2) They require heat in order to activate and become Colored Stains.
Just pop your Dye Bath into the furnace for a bit, and you'll have a bright, vibrant colored stain for all of your favorite wood blocks.
